title: Corn Puffs
instructions: Beat the egg yolk and add the milk, butter, corn, and all the sifted dried ingredients.  Beat the egg white until it hold peaks stiffly and fold it in to the corn mixture.  Using a tablespoon, spoon out and drop the batter into deep hot oil and fry the corn puffs until they are brown, about 3 minutes, turning only once.
source: The Williamsburg Cookbook, Updated 1975 Edition, Published by The Colonial Williamsburg Foundation, Williamsburg, Virginia.
